title: Should I buy an iMac as my first computer.? - Quora

response.answer_text: If it is a Mac for your first computer it is best to get a second hand one . One that is only a couple of years old , 3 years is a maybe if it is in exceptional condition. This is your first , I wouldn't get anything older and I wouldn't necessarily get a new one as  they are quite expensive . Learn it , learn what it can do and what you ask of it . Later in a couple of years you can probably sell it still for a good price and then go for a new one , one word …warranty ….they are great with customer service and warranty repairs. I have had several macs and macbooks through out the years and all were good and fun to work on .Good luck.

Sure, it is a great computer. But what do you need it for? There are some tasks for which a tablet might be just fine. And for some uses, a laptop might be preferable. And as you list what you need it for, other possibilities might be viable.
